function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of border control and case identification leading to unmonitored spread of contagious diseases","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of the disease, increased morbidity and mortality rates, overwhelming of healthcare facilities","Mitigation":"Integration of patient travel data, use of entry quarantine and health declaration system, electronic monitoring of high-risk individuals","Technologies":"Integration of travel data with NHI identification, mobile health declaration pass, QR code for health declaration form","People":"General population, travelers, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, healthcare authorities"},{"Description":"Misallocation of resources leading to inadequate supply of essential medical equipment like masks","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission due to lack of protective equipment, higher rate of infection among healthcare workers and the public","Mitigation":"Active resource allocation, price regulation of masks, increase in production using government funds and military personnel","Technologies":"Stockpile of masks, use of military personnel for mask production, price regulation","People":"Healthcare workers, general population","Owner":"CDC, government, military personnel"},{"Description":"Spread of misinformation leading to public anxiety and confusion","Impact":"Fear-driven behavior, non-compliance with public health measures, stigmatization of affected individuals","Mitigation":"Public education, dissemination of accurate information, debunking of myths and rumors","Technologies":"Public education campaigns, access to accurate information through official channels","People":"General public, affected individuals, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, healthcare authorities, public health organizations"}]}
